abstract.p: The Churn column on some recent executive appointments (M)<

block.p: Evercore Partners has named Robert B. Walsh chief financial officer. Mr. Walsh has been a senior partner at Deloitte & Touche. He succeeds David E. Wezdenko, who is leaving Evercore.
Evercore Partners has named Robert B. Walsh chief financial officer. Mr. Walsh has been a senior partner at Deloitte & Touche. He succeeds David E. Wezdenko, who is leaving Evercore.
Erik Kleinbeck has joined Third Avenue Management as a managing director in its client service and business development team. Mr. Kleinbeck was previously with Sparx Investment and Research USA.

Dahlman Rose & Company, an investment bank that specializes in marine transport, energy and natural resources, has named Stanley E. Ellington Jr. as a managing director to head its new exploration and production and oil field service investment banking group. Michael R. Uffman and Earl A. Stolz III have been named vice presidents in the group.
Katya Jestin has joined Jenner & Block as a partner in New York. Ms. Jestin was the deputy chief of the organized crime and racketeering section of the United States attorney's office in Brooklyn.
McDermott Will & Emery has elected John S. Herbert a partner. He will be a senior member of the M&A and private equity practices in New York.
Christopher C. Paci, formerly of King & Spalding, has joined DLA Piper's corporate and securities practice group as a partner in the New York office.
Barry Gassman, formerly of Mayer, Brown, Rowe & Maw, has joined the New York office of Pillsbury Winthrop Shaw Pittman as an energy finance partner.

Fulbright & Jaworski has hired three lawyers from Akerman Senterfitt: Richard C. Smith, Alexandre H. Rene and Guy D. Singer. All three had previously worked in the fraud section of the Justice Department's criminal division.
Vanessa Spiro, formerly of King & Spalding, has joined Jones Day as a partner.
James F. Lerner, formerly of Weil, Gotshal & Manges. has joined Dewey Ballantine as counsel.

Stroock & Stroock & Lavan has hired three partners from Brown Rudnick Berlack Israels: Boris Ziser is joining the structured finance practice group and Albert J. Pinz√≥n and Thomas R. Weinberger are joining the insurance practice group.
David Rhudy has joined SB Schonfeld Fund Advisors, the asset management arm of Schonfeld Group Holdings, as director of strategic planning and investor relations.
